column2: #Seleccionar la casa productora, alignment, y raza de la table heroes_information y realizar un conteo de los superheroes que su alignment es good, teniendo mas de 30 publicaciones.
groupby <- dbGetQuery(mydb, "SELECT publisher, alignment, race, count(name) FROM heroes_information WHERE alignment = 'good' GROUP BY publisher HAVING COUNT(name) > 30;")
